scripts.build-gas-building-client: rimraf build/gas-building-client && npx parcel build gas-building-client/si.html --out-dir build/gas-building-client --no-minify --no-cache --no-source-maps
scripts.build-gas-building-server: rimraf build/gas-building-server && cd gas-building-server && npx tsc --build
scripts.build-gas-building: npm run build-gas-building-client && npm run build-gas-building-server
scripts.build-gas-building-all: date +"%T" && npm run build-gas-building && npm run build-gas-building-package && cd gas-building-server/config && clasp push
scripts.buildAll: date +"%T" && npm run build && npm run package && npm run publish
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch client --watch server --exec "npm run buildAll" --ext js,ts,scss,css,html
